title: Haloarchaeal poly[(3-hydroxybutyrate)-co-(3-hydroxyvalerate)] composite films reinforced with graphene nanoplatelets as a biomaterial for skin tissue engineering
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24398-24412
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00713A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Prajakta Praveen Bhende, Joephil D. Dias, Honey Srivastava, Rashmi Chauhan, Sachin Waigaonkar, Anasuya Ganguly, Judith M. Braganςa
We explore the potential of a copolymer, poly[(3-hydroxybutyrate)-co-(3-hydroxyvalerate), naturally synthesized by Halogeometricum borinquense E3, as a potential tissue engineering biomaterial.
